    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_ba4593e8a9ea332fcea4cd5da27022e1c58fab97</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_ba4593e8a9ea332fcea4cd5da27022e1c58fab97</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy transfer between particles in solids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübertragung zwischen Partikel in den 
Körpern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transfert d'énergie entre les particules en 
solides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transferência de energia entre partículas nos 
sólidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasferimento di energia fra le particelle in 
solidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργειακή μεταφορά μεταξύ των μορίων στα στερεά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transferencia de energía entre las partículas 
en sólidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows particles in a solid (left) acquiring heat energy causing it to vibrate and transfer energy to particles near them (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">particle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vibrates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vibration</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Partikel in einem festem 
(link) die Wärmeenergie erwerbend, die es veranläßt, und Energie 
auf Partikel nahe ihnen zu übertragen zu vibrieren (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre des particules dans un 
plein (gauche) saisissant l'énergie calorifique le faisant vibrer et 
transférer l'énergie aux particules près d'elles (droit).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra partículas em um 
contínuo (esquerdo) adquirindo a energia de calor que faz com que 
vibre e transfira a energia às partículas perto delas (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le particelle in un 
solido (di sinistra) acquistando l'energia termica che lo induce a 
vibrare e trasferire l'energia alle particelle vicino loro (di 
destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μόρια σε ένα στερεό 
(αριστερό) που αποκτά την ενέργεια θερμότητας αναγκάζοντας το για
να δονηθεί και να μεταφέρει την ενέργεια στα μόρια κοντά σε τους 
(δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra partículas en un 
sólido (izquierdo) adquiriendo la energía térmica que lo hace 
vibrar y transferir energía a las partículas cerca de ellas 
(derecho).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeenergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Partikel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübertragung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vibriert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erschütterung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie calorifique</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">partícula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">contínuo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">transferência de energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia termica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">particella</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">solido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trasferimento di energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στερεό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
